items.sentence: I don\'t think you need to tell Tom what to do.
I don\'t like to go outside when it\'s raining.
I don\'t mean to be unsociable, but I\'m tired.
I often write to Tom, but he never writes back.
I thought I heard someone knocking on the door.
There\'s something I need to do this afternoon.
There\'s something I want to talk to you about.
I think this tie will go great with that shirt.
I think you should change your profile picture.
I think you were better looking with long hair.
I thought I told you not to call Tom at school.
I thought this building had a sprinkler system.
Which brand of toilet paper do you usually buy?
Which is easier to read, this book or that one?
Who is responsible for leaving the window open?
Tom asked Mary to pretend to be his girlfriend.
Tom believes that the moon landings were faked.
Tom works for a tech company in Silicon Valley.
Tom worries about how Mary will make ends meet.
Tom would likely try doing this some other way.
